entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Severn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
